original_text: Some time later, two of the king's officers made him angry. One of them was the king's cupbearer. The other was the king's baker.
korean_text: 그 후에 애굽 왕의 술 맡은 자와 떡 굽는 자가 그들의 주인 애굽 왕에게 범죄한지라

sentences.original_text: two of the king's officers made him angry
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 두 관원이 그를 화나게 했다

sentences.original_text: One of them was the king's cupbearer
sentences.korean_translation: 그중 한 명은 왕의 술 맡은 자였다

sentences.original_text: The other was the king's baker
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 한 명은 왕의 떡 맡은 자였다
